resources.string: Cannot open worlds, no read/write access on storage! Try restarting the app and accept the read/write permission request.

There are no custom markers yet! \n You can create one by long-tapping on the place on the map where you want a marker, then tap \"Create custom marker\". Then choose a marker icon and a Y-coordinate. And then check if you can find it here!

This app is created by @protolambda. 
 More information (including the roadmap, changelog and help-information) can be found at: blocktopograph.protolambda.com. 
 
 Please make a backup of all your loved MCPE worlds in case of data-corruption!
 NOTE: Minecraft might not load a whole world because of a single corrupt chunk of NBT!
 
 This app is built for MCPE 0.14.x.
 This app is not yet fully tested for MCPE (beta) 0.15.x.
 Older MCPE versions are not supported.

resources.string:
Warning: this is a very experimental beta feature.
 Markers can be removed/edited by editing the markers.txt in your world folder.
 Marker icons:
 • default_marker, blue_marker, green_marker, red_marker 
 • Entity data-names (case sensitive) 
 • Block data-names (case sensitive)
